Translations.Text: ‘Tomaloke ojana karaomte paraipurna ojana karaiba, yibilake ojanata kama diye tomaloke sihamtara antarbhukta naha’ba
‘Arau ojana karaiba sathika tulacanita
‘Arau manuhaka sihamtara praapya bastu kama nidiba arau prthiraita biparyaya srsti karai nuphuraiba
‘Arau se'i sattara takbaraa aralambana karaa yijane tomalokaka arau tomalokara purbarartisakalaka srsti karaiche’
Sihamte ka’le, ‘niscaya tumi yadugrasta haicha
‘Tumi dekhuna amara darae'i ejana manuha, arau ami tomaka michaliyabilakara antarbhukta buli bharao
‘Eteke tumi yadi satyabadi horaa, tente akasara eta tukuraa amara oparata pela'i diya’
Te'om ka’le, ‘mora pratipalake'i bhaladarae jane tomaloke yi karaa’
Eteke sihamte te'omka asbikara karaile. Phalata sihamtaka meghacchanna dinara sastiye graasa karaile. Niscaya eya achila eta bhisana dinara sasti
Niscaya iyata ache nidarsana, kintu sihamtara sarahabhage'i mumina nahaya
Arau tomara raba, niscaya te'om mahaparaakramasali, parama dayalu
Niscaya e'ito (kora'ana) srstijagatara raba (allaha)ra taraphara paraa aratirna
Bisbasta rauhe (jibraile) seya lai aratarana karaiche
Tomara hrdayata, yate tumi satarkakarai sakalara antarbhukta horaa
Suspasta arabi bhasata
Arau niscaya purbararti kitabasamuhata iyara ullekha ache
E'ito sihamtara babe eta nidarsana nahayane barau ye, bani icharaa'ilara alimasakale e'i bisaye jane
arau yadi ami iyaka kono anarabara prati aratirna karailohemtena
arau se'ito te'om sihamtara ocarata patha karaile tathapi'o sihamte iyara prati imana posana nakarailehemtena
E'idarae'i ami bisayato aparaadhisakalara antarata sancara karaicho
Sihamte yantranadayaka sasti nedekha laike iyara oparata imana posana nakaraiba
Eteke se'i (sasti)to sihamtara ocarata akasmikabharae ahi paraiba, athaca sihamte ekorae upalabdhi karaiba noraaraiba
Tetiya sihamte ka’ba, ‘amaka alapa arakasa diya ha’bane’
tente sihamte amara sasti tbaraanbita karaiba bicarae neki
tumi bhabi coraacona! Yadi ami sihamtaka dirghakala bhoga-bilasa karaibalai di'om
tara pichata sihamtaka yi bisaye satarka karaa haichila seya sihamtara ocarata ahi parae
tetiya sihamtaka yi bhoga-bilasara upakarana hicape diya haichila seya sihamtara kono upakarata ahibane
arau ami ene kono janapada dhbansa karaa na'i yara babe kono satarkakarai nachila
(sihamtara babe) smarana hicape; arau ami an'yayakarai nahaya
Arau cayatanabilake eya lai aratarana karaa na'i
Arau sihamta e'i kamara yogya'o nahaya lagate sihamte e'i kamara samartha'o naraakhe
Niscaya sihamtaka srarana karaara paraa'o amtarata rakha haiche
Eteke tumi allahara lagata ana kono ilahaka ahbana nakaraiba, an'yatha tumi sastipraaptabilakara antarbhukta ha’ba
Arau tumi tomara nikatatmiya sakalaka satarka karaa
Arau yisakale tomara anusarana karae, te'omlokara prati tomara bahu aranata karaa
Eteke yadi sihamte tomara abadhya haya, tente koraa, ‘tomaloke yi karaa, niscaya ma'i tara paraa sampurna mukta’
Arau tumi nirbhara karaa paraakramasali, parama dayalu (allaha)ra oparata
yijane tomaka dekhe yetiya tumi (chalatara babe) thiya horaa
arau (teraemi) chajadakarai sakalara majata tomara gatibidhi (laksya karae)
Niscaya te'om sarbasraota, sarbajna
Ma'i tomalokaka sambada dimane, kara oparata cayatana aratirna haya
sihamta aratirna haya pratyeka carama michaliya arau papista byaktira oparata
Sihamte kana pati thake arau sihamtara adhikansa'i michaliya
Arau kabisakala, sihamtara anusarana kerala bibhraantabilakehe karae
Tumi laksya karaa na'ine ye, sihamta udbhraanta hai pratyeka upatyakata ghurai phurae
arau sihamte enekuraa katha kaya, yito sihamte (nije'i) nakarae

Kintu te'omlokara bahirae yisakale imana aniche, satkarma karaiche, arau allahaka bechi bechi smarana karaiche arau atyacaraita horaara pichata pratisodha grahana karaiche. Arau yalimasakale atisighrae'i janibalai paba ye, kona dharanara gantabyasthalata sihamte pratyarartana karaiba
